A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An unparalleled mess of a film. Full of plot holes\, dull characters\, ponderous heavy handed virtue signaling and humour that falls way\, way off the mark. Star Wars is now a husk that draws heavily from the bank of nostalgia; milking the fan base that has supported it over the decades in the process. I am one fan who has had enough. It's nothing short of vandalism.
